attributes.action: to keep schools closed till the new school year or till next year
attributes.additional_details: l, I know you think we are dumb but its hard, many students can't be able to understand the work and going back to school we will have exams and some students won't pass and it will be so hard for students so please listen to us or think of yourself in our shoes wouldn't you like the parliment to listen to you we have to listen to you so please please make this petition happen I beg you with all my heart please
attributes.background: to keep schools closed till the new school year or till next year as students are stressed to go back to school as its so hard for students as we are vulnerable and could carry covid 19 and pass it on to our parents the reason we have many petitions about this as we are so scared to go back to scho-

rejection.details:
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/572418.

Exam arrangements and the current coronavirus pandemic can cause worry and stress. You can find information on how to deal with stress here:  

Young Minds: https://youngminds.org.uk 

Children’s Society: https://www.childrenssociety.org.uk/mental-health-advice-for-children-and-young-people/issues-affecting-young-people   

Childline: https://www.childline.org.uk/info-advice/your-feelings/anxiety-stress-panic/coping-with-stress/
